1.name: Fatalis
1.info: A legendary black dragon known only as Fatalis. Rumored to have destroyed a kingdom in a single night, and has taken its castle for a roost.
1.shoutout: Fatalis unleashes Hellish Flames upon its enemies.
1.death: With a mighty roar, Fatalis has fallen.

2.name: Hans, the Deadly Poison Slime
2.info: One of the leaders of the Devil King Army. Either you'll be melted by their digestive enzymes or they'll smother you to death.
2.entry: My name is Hans... I am one of the leaders of the Devil King Army. Hans the Deadly Poison Slime.
2.shoutout: Hans lunges at his enemies, disintegrating everything in his path.
2.death: With the final blow, Hans have been erased from existence.

3.name: Zakum
3.info: Zakum is an evil spirit possessing an enormous statue. It rests deep in the lava caves waiting for powerful players to challenge it.
3.entry: The power of this ore will summon Zakum.
3.shoutout: Zakum slams the ground crushing the players.
3.death: The stone crumbles... Zakum is no more!

4.name: Charizard
4.info: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

5.name: Dino Gura
5.info: Gura dressed as a Dinosaur for Halloween.
5.shoutout: Dino Gura asks politely to bite you.

6.name: Mega Charizard X
6.info: Using the Charizardite X, Charizard has Mega Evolved into Mega Charizard X.
6.entry: Charizard has Mega Evolved to Mega Charizard X!
6.shoutout: Mega Charizard X used Fire Blast!

7.name: Panda
7.info: A big panda from an anime I didn't watch.
7.shoutout: Panda goes gorilla mode on you.

9.name: Behemoth
9.info: Ferocious beasts with regal, fluttering manes and roars violent enough to shake the earth itself. After rending foes with long claws and horns, they usually use their sharp teeth to deal the killing blow. Also known to use high-level magic, Behemoths are enemies of the top rank.
9.death: Behemoth has been slayed! Duty Complete!

10.name: Stormterror
10.info: The Anemo elemental dragon and the original Dragon of the Easy of Mondstadt's Four Winds.
10.entry: In the heart of the storm, Stormterror stares at you threateningly!
